page.title: 01New Mills.
page.content: New Mills is a busy town.It is in the centre of a valley.It has a population of about 10,500.It has got 1 canal and 3 railways.It has got it's own bingo hall,town hall and sports grounds. There are 2 estates and they have started to build some more. Most of the houses are terraced and are made of stone.The sports grounds could be the cricket ground,there are several football grounds and tennis courts.There is also a youth centre. There are several factories. There is a library, and near that there is a police station. The shops in New Mills are D.I.Y shops, sweet shops, clothes shops and there are 2 markets. One is an outdoor market. There are 2 supermarkets.New Mills has a good community spirit.
